title: The True Story of Christmas
body:
'Twas the Night Before Christmas, And all through the rift
Not a person was dying, Not one single stiff.
The lanes were all pushed to the turrets afar,
Lee Sin starts recalling, to shop the bazaar.

When all of the sudden, a cry could be heard
"A-hut 2, 3," said the little patch of fur.
"You need to start running" said Kat from lane,
The announcers voice, "An Ally has been slain."

Tension through the map, as your team fills with loathing
"How the hell did you die?" They all say while moaning.
First blood has been given, to the one we call Satan
In all chat you read, "Why you be hatin'?"

The raging begins, "We can't stop him now!"
As the poison ticks, yet another one down.
Kill after kill, your team lost all hope
There's nothing to do, you're back in his scope.

You barely escape, with one hundred health
When all of the sudden you hit something stealthed.
An evil laugh, can be heard from some where
Your health drains lower, At the face of doom you stare.

The game goes on, you gain no advantage
As a team fight occurs, the rat does the damage.
One by one, your teammates they fall
You're the only one left, from the ashes you crawl

With but a sliver of health, you escape overjoyed
Getting farther and farther, When your hopes are destroyed.
They curse and they flame, saying that you lack all skill
But all you can hear, is 

**Teemo Pentakill.**



________

So, not even ten minutes after I posted this the first time it got removed because apparently it was on the wrong boards.


Merry Christmas everyone! May the enemy Teemo never get a pentakill.

replies.body: A number of our internal emails here have had Christmas poems, this would fit right in!

:D 

Just the fact that a rioter responded to my poem... It makes me warm and fuzzy inside.

> [{quoted}](name=Bark Wahlberg,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=4mzggPeW,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2014-12-23T23:05:25.296+0000)
>
> http://www.timecapsule.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/Warm-Fuzzies.jpg

The real story of Christmas would be providing the East Coast players with the same quality game experience as the West Coasters get on a daily basis. :)
And being a decent human being would mean letting it freaking go.
Til Christmas is about satan getting a pentakill.
Lol, how is that picture relevant to the text? XD

I got really bored and decided to write a little poem. :D 

Actually, I had been spamming "Twas the night before Christmas" Poems about my duo partner Blitzcrank in ARAM to be funny and chose to write a full length one. Hope you guys enjoy!

The fact that you made it get darker and darker as the poem went on is pure genius.

Bravo, sir, bravo.
Well thank you! Glad you liked it.
Not accurate, this implies that Lee Sin loses.
He never did say which team the two were on. Lee and Teemo could be on the same team.

> [{quoted}](name=PG Electro522,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=4mzggPeW,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2014-12-24T05:30:30.473+0000)
>
> He never did say which team the two were on. Lee and Teemo could be on the same team.

I tried to imply that they were on opposite teams. I wanted it to seem like you were the Lee Sin giving first blood, then your team rages at you later for feeding teemo...

 Because, ya' know... That's how league works.
It also implies that Teemo wins, making it accurate.
